name: Dark Lab
description:
Defend your underground laboratory where you carry out research using the mystical dark matter. Be wary! It causes portals from the dark realm to open up near your lab. Be prepared to defend yourself.

WSAD - Control Dark Soldier,
Hold E - Close Portal / Repair Base

Mouse - Aim turret
Mouse LB - Fire turret

Github: https://github.com/Unvios22/DarkLab

Music from https://filmmusic.io/
"Big Rock" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com/)
License: CC BY (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)
